name: **Dog Island**
description: Dog Island L566-597 Sheet 37 Isolated as inner islands go, low lying and entirely separated from other islands in this group by a deep water channel to the ENE. Big footprint especially at LW. Rough grass covers the top, which supports half a dozen shhep, besides Shellduck, Great Black backed Gull, Herring Gull and Atlantic Seal. A little rough for camping, and no water. Great views. Landing is soft enough in a dogleg inlet in the ESE corner.
